name: Quick-Pickled Spicy Asparagus
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: I love pickled asparagus but got tired of spending so much money on tiny little jars and decided to pickle my own. I also like it spicy but feel free to halve the crushed red pepper or omit it altogether if spice is not your thing.
directions: Place trimmed asparagus in a quart-sized canning jar
Add garlic, pepper flakes, mustard seed, and peppercorns
Combine vinegar, water, salt, and sugar in a medium saucepan over medium heat; bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes
Pour vinegar mixture over the asparagus
Screw on the lid and let sit until lid has sealed, about 1 hour
Place in the refrigerator until pickled, at least 2 days
